page.title: 03THE PEOPLE AND THE COMMUNITY
page.content: Many of the people interviewed had moved into South Cerney recently: in a few cases to work there, but many because it is within easy reach of Cirencester and Swindon. Most had come from other parts of the County, though some, who had moved in connection with their work, had come from the North of England. No_ one had parents who had lived in the village before them, but some had parents who had joined them, to live there. The majority of the inhabitants questioned had lived there for between 7 and 15 years. People's reactions to the community are very positive - they find it a friendly, but quiet place with good shops and lovely surrounding country_ side. Suggestions for future develop_ ment included better facilities for leisure and public transport, for the elderly and for shopping.
